DOC.brief_summary: Intravenous vitamin C may improve skin hyperpigmentation in chronic hemodialysis patients
DOC.brief_title: Can Intravenous Vitamin C Improve Skin Hyperpigmentation in Long-Term Hemodialysis Patients?
DOC.detailed_description: Melanogenesis is caused by enzymatic conversion of tyrosine to melanin pigments.Ascorbic acid has the ability to inhibit peroxidase and may thus inhibit melanin synthesis.
DOC.criteria: chronic hemodialysis patients allergic to vitamin C, using steroid, etc
